titles.title: For the relief of Nuratu Olarewaju Abeke Kadiri.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 105-524.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 11.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 679.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/17/1997--Introduced. Declares a named individual to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
